author: philogy
content: Is there a reason why every call with some `value > 0` has to cost +6700 more gas? Isn't the cost of updating an account's balance similar to cold storage/address access where accessing/updating the balance at all has a certain cost but once paid changing the balance to a different value is cheaper?
